title: All Docker, Kubernetes, and CNCF labs
description: Presented by the Digital Academy - All Docker, Kubernetes, and CNCF labs.

courses.title: Container Basics: Module 1 - Docker Basics
courses.description: In this lab, we will examine the Docker CLI and execute our first container.

courses.title: Container Basics: Module 2 - Creating custom images
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn to create our own containers with Docker.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals: Module 1: Kubernetes Overview
courses.description: In this lab, we will demonstrate how Kubernetes can deploy containers and complex apps.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals: Module 2: Kubernetes Architecture
courses.description: In this lab, we will introduce you to the Kubernetes Architecture.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals: Module 3 - Introduction to Pods
courses.description: In this lab, we will examine how to run containers in Pods.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals: Module 4 - Introduction to Deployments
courses.description: In this lab, we will explain the concept of ReplicaSets and Deployments.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals: Module 5 - Deployment Types
courses.description: In this lab, we will examine how to run Pods using different deployment types.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals: Module 6 - Review Fundamentals
courses.description: In this lab, let's cover everything we learned in Kubernetes Fundamentals.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals 2: Module 1 - Introduction to Services
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn how Kubernetes Services provide access to Pods and Deployments.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals 2: Module 2 - Introduction to ConfigMaps
courses.description: In this lab, we will decouple configuration from applications with Kubernetes ConfigMaps.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals 2: Module 3 - Introduction to Secrets
courses.description: In this lab, we will deploy sensitive information to Pods with Kubernetes Secrets.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals 2: Module 4 - Introduction to Persistent Volumes
courses.description: In this lab, we will create PersistentVolumes, and provide them to Pods via PersistentVolumeClaims.

courses.title: Kubernetes Fundamentals 2: Module 5 - Introduction to Ingresses
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn about a higher level of abstraction of Kubernetes Services.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 1 - Helm
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn about how to use Helm the package manager for Kubernetes.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 2 - Heptio Velero
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn how to manage disaster recovery for your Kubernetes cluster resources and persistent volumes.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 3 - Prometheus Getting Started
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn how to start collecting system metrics with Prometheus.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 4 - Logging with EFK
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn how to implement centralized logging using an ElasticsSearch, Fluent Bit, and Kibana (EFK) stack on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 5 - Istio Getting Started
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn about how to use the Istio Service Mesh.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 6 - KNative Getting Started
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn about how to use KNative.

courses.title: Kubernetes CNCF: Module 7 - Leveraging Open Policy Agent
courses.description: In this lab, we will learn about the Open Policy Agent and how to set policies.
